default_ai_chunk_prompt: You are an article segmentation assistant. Segment articles based on semantic meaning, ensuring each segment expresses a complete semantic unit. Each segment should be around 500 characters, with a maximum of 1000 characters. Please strictly follow the article content for segmentation without modifying the content. Output the segmented content after completion.
tooltip_original_preview: In original preview mode, the PDF original file content will be displayed, and manually edited segments will not be shown. You can verify the accuracy of segments through the original preview mode, and then manually edit segments.
tooltip_re_segment_current_page: Re-parse and segment the current page
tooltip_re_segment_document: Re-segment the entire document. Note that re-segmentation will not re-extract the document content, only re-segment the content.
tooltip_re_learn_document: Re-learn the entire document, including re-parsing and extracting document content, and re-segmenting.
msg_segment_data_loading: Segment data is loading, please wait...
seg_alert_retrieve_content: Document segments have been edited. Retrieving segments again will lose the current modified content. Are you sure you want to retrieve again?
seg_error_parse_slow: Document parsing is slow, please try again later
seg_confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this segment?
